title: Fragments
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave foundation
inscribed: B: "ure  D indienne bon teint de Lecier freres ...du Beguet pres Bordeaux"
description: Two pieces of fabric. A has the pattern; B a partial factory stamp. Printed in red on white. A has part of a cartouche showing a goddess (Justice?) with a winged Mercury behind her within egg and dart framing. Small floral sprays at either side.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments.
Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-11-a,b.
